text.text: We have taken the initiative to alleviate former mine hazards and as we conduct our work, we have a great interest in being responsible to the natural environment. Being aware of and protective of the environment is a key tenet of our company. As a mining company, we are a resource developer but at the same time, we want to be considerate and aware of the impacts for the environment and for those who use the land for hunting, fishing, trapping or other traditional activities.
